description: This table contains documentation on instrument issues.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INSTR_ISSUE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to document if any issues were encountered with a piece of equipment or instrument.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: INSTR_ISSUE_DESC
columns.description: This item is used to describe any issues encountered with a piece of equipment or instrument.

columns.name: INSTR_ISSUE_REPORTED_TO
columns.description: This item is used to document who was informed of issues encountered with a piece of equipment or instrument.
